tool_description: Draws aspect lines between planets on the natal chart with customizable line styles and colors based on aspect types.

planet1_x.description: X coordinates for first planet in each aspect

planet1_y.description: Y coordinates for first planet in each aspect

planet2_x.description: X coordinates for second planet in each aspect

planet2_y.description: Y coordinates for second planet in each aspect

aspect_types.description: Type of each aspect to be drawn

show_major_only.description: Whether to show only major aspects (conjunction, opposition, trine, square, sextile)

error_messages: Mismatched coordinate arrays: All coordinate arrays must have the same length.
Invalid opacity value: Line opacity must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Coordinate arrays mismatch: aspect_types array must match the length of coordinate arrays.
Invalid coordinates: All coordinate values must be numeric and within canvas bounds.
usage: Input aspect data from Aspect Pattern Detector and planet coordinates from Chart Coordinate Mapper. Renders connecting lines between aspected planets with appropriate styling.

lines_drawn.description: Number of aspect lines successfully drawn

skipped_aspects.description: List of aspects that were skipped due to filtering or errors
